text: Is it just me or is HubSpot backend very slow at the moment
<@ULSCN5SSW> are you sure you’re able to do this so it doesn’t just create a “task” in HubSpot but actually logs a call or email, or meeting?
I haven't really tested it. I just remembered looking at it in the docs, I will give it a try
I appreciate it. In my scenario, it only converts to a “task’ in HS. We’re trying to push SFDC emails to HubSpot emails, SFDC calls to HS calls, SFDC meetings to HS meetings, etc
